title: shirt
description:
CONTENTS, CARE & ORIGIN
CONTENTS
We are working with monitoring programs to guarantee compliance with the social, environmental, health, and safety standards of our garments.

To evaluate their compliance, we have developed an auditing program and plans for continual improvement.
OUTER SHELL
100% Cotton
CARE
Caring for your clothes is caring for the environment.
Wash your garments only when needed, as sometimes freshening them up is sufficient. Wash cycles slowly wear down fabrics. By reducing the amount of washing, we lengthen the life of our garments and reduce water and energy consumption in their care.
[car]8
Hand wash max 30ºC/86ºF
[car]14
Do not use bleach/whitener
[car]18
Iron maximum 110ºC/230ºF
[car]125
Tetrachloroethylene Dry Clean
[car]31
The low-temperature dryer may be used
ORIGIN
We are working with our providers, workers, unions, and international organizations to develop a supply chain that respects and promotes human rights, contributing to the Sustainable Development Goals of the United Nations. 

Thanks to the collaboration with our suppliers, we are working to understand the facilities and processes that are used to manufacture our garments with the goal of understanding the traceability of our products.
Made in Bangladesh
